metadata.name: Crocodile life
metadata.description:
Anthropocene 

Since the "Modern Human Existence" found istelf against the odds of the nature, the earth for him, has become an object just to exploite from. 

An attitude that overpowered him and turned him into a massive geophysical force, giving him the illusive right to colonize and to terrorize it. 

The presented artworks, herein are in the form of "mixed media art" in which the manners of modern human and the world, encountering each other. 

During this exhibition, several objects from nature, and human artifacts are used. With highlighting the mentioned era's biological history. 

The main concern of this project, is set on to explore the extinction manners of various species, that is, thoroughly, a consequence of human-interference with its natural environment. 

My goal by compiling this work is, in fact, creating an awareness to construct for reaching the better concept and reality. For inhabitable world and livable for every living being.
